Class PropertyViewerGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • PropertyViewerGUI
  • public class PropertyViewerGUI
extends java.lang.Object
    PropertyViewerGUI provides the GUI for the project. It displays the property and strings, and it listens to button clicks.

      • setPropertyViewSize

        public void setPropertyViewSize​(int width,
                                int height)
        Set a fixed size for the property display. If set, this size will be used for all properties. If not set, the GUI will resize for each property.
